description: A devastating fire at a popular Goa nightclub claimed at least 25 lives and injured six others late Saturday night. The blaze, which broke out during peak hours, trapped many victims, primarily staff, due to suffocation. Authorities cited non-compliance with fire safety norms and lack of valid permissions as contributing factors to the tragedy.

description: Indian women’s team vice-captain Smriti Mandhana on Sunday addressed weeks of speculation surrounding her personal life, confirming that her wedding with music composer Palash Muchhal has been "called off". The star batter appealed to fans and the media to respect the privacy of both families.

The blaze, possibly ignited by a cylinder blast, spread rapidly through the temporary structure. Authorities have arrested club managers, with owners facing arrest warrants, as investigations into safety norms commence.

description: Netflix is acquiring Warner Bros. in an $82.7 billion deal, bringing HBO Max and HBO under its umbrella.  While assuring subscribers "nothing is changing today," the streaming giant anticipates a 12-18 month closing period.  Despite Netflix's assurances of a pro-consumer move, politicians and industry groups have raised significant concerns about potential price hikes and job losses.

description: BJP MP Kangana Ranaut, TMC MP Mahua Moitra, and NCP (SP) MP Supriya Sule were captured dancing together at industrialist Naveen Jindal's daughter's wedding. The trio performed a popular Bollywood song, with videos of their unexpected collaboration going viral on social media. Ranaut had previously shared behind-the-scenes photos of dance practice with her political counterparts.

The blaze, reportedly triggered by an explosion, occurred in an establishment operating without valid permissions. Fire safety norms were not followed, and access for emergency services was severely hampered, leading to a tragic loss of life.

Bill Gates, Phoebe's father, has supported the venture with his time and experience. Phia aims to make online shopping smarter and more sustainable. The app offers price comparisons, discounts, and secondhand options.

description: Shocking CCTV footage revealed police officers dumping an unidentified body outside a shop in Meerut's Lohiyanagar area overnight. The incident sparked public outrage, leading to the suspension of an outpost in-charge, a constable, and termination of a home guard. An internal inquiry has been launched to identify the deceased and investigate the alleged attempt by police to evade postmortem procedures.

Brittany Mahomes hits back as fans question Patrick Mahomes’ legacy this season
description: Patrick Mahomes faces scrutiny amid the Kansas City Chiefs' uncertain playoff outlook. NBA star Kevin Durant and Mahomes' wife, Brittany, have publicly defended the quarterback, dismissing claims of a "down year" and questioning his legacy. With playoff hopes on the line, Week 14 presents a crucial opportunity for Mahomes to silence critics and reaffirm his all-time status.

title: 'Stay in India her personal decision': EAM on Hasina's extradition; future hinges on circumstances
description: In a recent statement, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar highlighted that Sheikh Hasina's visit to India is a personal decision shaped by last year's developments. He underscored India's unwavering support for Bangladesh, reiterating the importance of democratic values. Jaishankar also defended India's sovereignty in foreign relations, stressing that no nation has the authority to dictate its alliances with others.

title: Grim theory on missing coach Travis Turner as veteran cop warns chilling clues
description: A missing Virginia football coach, Travis Turner, may never be found. He vanished from his home on November 20. Authorities charged him with child pornography offenses. A law enforcement expert states dense woods and wildlife make recovery difficult. Search teams are using advanced tools, but success remains uncertain. A reward is offered for information leading to his arrest.

title: People living near mines showing lung damage
description: Recent findings indicate that neighborhoods adjacent to Indian mining operations are experiencing significant lung health issues and exposure to heavy metals, reflecting the dangers faced by workers. Research highlights concerning levels of abnormal lung function and signs of fibrosis, even among children, underscoring the severe impact of dust pollution.

title: New controversy brewing: Govt weighs A-GPS mandate; phone cos resist over privacy concerns
description: Government discussions are under way for mandatory satellite-assisted mobile phone tracking for law enforcement and disaster management. The proposal, stalled for five years due to privacy concerns and device maker reluctance, aims for more accurate location data than current tower-based methods. Manufacturers like Apple and Samsung are wary of potential misuse and insist on user consent for such pinpoint tracking.

title: Anna Kournikova & Enrique Iglesias net worth 2025: Career, earnings, biz
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.

title: LeBron James sends heartfelt 'family' message to fans after viral Toronto clip
description: LeBron James felt immense love from Toronto fans during the Lakers' recent game against the Raptors. The NBA legend, touched by the cheers and signs, called the fans "family" and expressed his deep appreciation for their unwavering support. He highlighted the special place Toronto holds in his heart, cherishing the warm welcome he always receives.

title: Dragon vs Eagle: Can US survive 'China Shock 2.0'? India could soften blow
description: China's economic rise, dubbed the "China Shock," is entering a new phase with advanced technologies like EVs and semiconductors. This "China Shock 2.0" threatens global manufacturing jobs and economic leadership, driven by China's industrial policy and dominance across key supply chains. Nations face a critical challenge in coordinating a response to prevent irreversible Chinese dominance.

title: ‘Metaverse’ budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
description: Meta is reportedly planning to significantly cut its Metaverse budget by up to 30% for 2026, signaling a potential shift away from its virtual reality ambitions. This move follows substantial losses and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence initiatives.
